item.title: Bangalore to Nagarahole Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Nagarahole promises an exciting adventure amidst the wildlife and natural beauty of the national park. Nagarahole, also known as Rajiv Gandhi National Park, is renowned for its diverse flora and fauna. Here's a suggested itinerary for your solo trip: Bangalore to Nagarahole Begin your journey early in the morning to allow ample time for exploration. The distance
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
